role.argrole: point of time arg0 happens to be at

example.parse: (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 正)) (VP (VV 值) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-PN-TPC (NR 中国) (CC 与) (NR 韩国)) (NP-SBJ (ADJP (JJ 双边)) (NP (NN 贸易额))) (VP (PP-TMP (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADVP (AD 大幅)) (VP (VV 增长)))) (DEC 之))) (NP (NN 际))))))
example.arg: *OP* 中国 与 韩国 双边 贸易额 *T*-1 大幅 增长 之 际
